audit.title: What You'll Get from Your Free AI Automation Audit
audit.subtitle: We'll walk you through what's possible, what's practical, and what will make the biggest impact first — no tech jargon, no hard sell. Just clarity.
audit.benefit1Desc: We'll analyse your current daily and weekly tasks — emails, bookings, content, admin — and pinpoint what can run automatically using the tools you already use.
audit.benefit1Example: Example: "When a new lead fills out your website form, automatically send a confirmation email, add them to your CRM, and schedule a follow-up."
audit.benefit2Desc: Not everything has to be done at once. We'll help you spot the quick wins that save you the most time and give you the fastest return on investment. Usually this means automating lead responses, bookings, or client follow-ups first.
audit.benefit3Desc: Some automations make sense once your business grows or you add more tools. We'll show you which ones to plan for later — so your automation system grows with your business, not ahead of it.
audit.benefit4Desc: We'll be honest about what's best left human — like personal messages, strategy decisions, or sensitive communications. Automation should enhance your business, not replace your personal touch.
audit.roadmapSubtitle: You'll walk away with a simple, visual roadmap showing:
audit.roadmapItem1: The top 3 automations to start with
audit.roadmapItem4: A quote if you'd like us to build it for you
audit.cta: Get Your Free Automation Audit – See What You Could Save This Month
audit.trustNote: This isn't a sales call — it's a clarity call. You'll leave knowing exactly how automation can work for your business — even if you decide to build it yourself.
